Space Invaders

Status: Finished
Software Used: CLion, GitKraken, GitHub
Languages Used: C++
Textures: Kenney Space Shooter Redux Game Assets
Itch.io Page: Zoe Rowbotham - Space Invaders

Space Invaders is a small game recreation I made as part of my first year in order to help me learn C++. In the game, alien ships move downwards towards tha player. In order to win the game, the player has to shoot all of the ships. However, if the ships get to close or the player gets shot, you lose and Earth is taken over by aliens...

As part of this project, I experimented with different trajectories of the aliens. The main ones were the curves (quadratic) trajectory and the sin curve. These can be seen below.
